Premium Figma Prototyping and Animation UI Kit Library

Scaffold is a UI kit library of 160 pre-built Figma design prototypes and animations for you to use in your design work. Built with a commitment to reusability, speed and flexibility, Scaffold lets you build complex Figma prototypes quickly, while staying flexible enough to fit your unique needs.

Learn More Buy Now

Scaffold Use Cases and Benefits

  • Quickly adding interactions to your existing designs
  • Prototyping complex, multi-screen animations
  • Showing clients interactions in your mock-ups or designs

Who is Scaffold built for?

  • Designers who want to add quickly and easily add interactions, prototypes or animations to existing designs
  • Designers and Developers looking to explore different types of motion design available in Figma and ready to add to future designs
  • Design studios doing client work who want to easily add interaction to client work, without spending hours tweaking connections and frame interactions
  • Probably *not* for teams that have dedicated motion designers!

Package Details: What's Included

Scaffold is a premium Figma library of pre-built animations and design prototypes, designed and ready to drop into your projects. Built for reusability, speed, customization and flexibility. Ready to use on a full range of projects from client work to in-house designs to new product develop or side projects.

  • The main Scaffold file that includes 40 core prototype scaffolds, and 160 total variations on those designs.
  • Prototypes and animations built to be used in web and mobile design suitable for almost any kind of digital design you can think of.
  • Prototypes and animations include designs for mobile, web, marketing, social, gallery, e-commerce, menus and navigation.
  • Eight example prototypes that show the power and flexibility of Scaffold, giving you inspiration for integrating prototyping into your own work.

FAQs and Extra Details:

  • How does the lifetime license work?
    Similar to Sketch, and Flowkit. All updates until Dec 2020 are included in the current price of $49.00 (single license) or $199.0 (team license). Future releases will be marked with a new version number.
  • Does Scaffold work with Sketch, Adobe XD, or InVision Studio?
    It's not recommended. Scaffold has been built based on custom animation and prototyping features in Figma. Because of that, you'll get the best results using Scaffold in Figma. If you're interested in a future version using another tool please contact me.
  • Does Scaffold use Figma Components that can fit into our existing design system?
    Not at this stage (April 2020). Figma Components don't reliably save prototyping connections on duplication or re-use. Scaffold relies on copy and pasting, which has consistent behavior across files, pages and within pages. I would love to rebuild Scaffold using Components in the future, so watch this space based on changes to Figma!

Scaffold Product Updates
